name: Mudbox 3D Scene File
summary: Learn about .MUD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mudbox scenes are created by digital art professionals and are used for still or animated digital art as well as for video game characters.
NOTE: MUD files can be exported to a 16-bit Photoshop .PSD file for touch-ups.

description: 3D image created by Mudbox, a 3D digital sculpting and painting application; saves a 3D model with textures and lighting information; can include multiple sculpt and paint layers; can also incorporate models (.OBJ, and .FBX) created in other 3D software tools such as Maya.
